mapper.select: SELECT n.*, d.doctor_name AS authorName FROM patient_note n LEFT JOIN doctor d ON n.staff_id = d.doctor_id WHERE n.patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY n.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO patient_note (patient_id, admission_id, staff_id, note_type, content, visibility) VALUES (#{patientId}, #{admissionId}, #{staffId}, #{noteType}, #{content}, #{visibility})
mapper.update: UPDATE patient_note SET content = #{content}, note_type = #{noteType}, visibility = #{visibility}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE note_id = #{noteId}
